about-me.title: About me
about-me.desc:
I'm a web developer with over {{ years }} years of commercial experience gained in global polish software house.

My strongest point is Angular framework but I've also some experience with Node and MongoDB (private large app on production) and some sample (check my GitHub) web applications implemented in React and Vue and REST API with Express. I am interested in both web and full-stack development.

My interests include non-fiction and popular science, ancient Greek and biblical exegesis.

I'm also author of wide web platform apologetykabiblijna.pl, built and deployed with my own from scratch (Angular 2+, REST API with Node.js + Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku).

education.title: Education
education.faculty-1: Faculty of Automatic Control, Electronics and Computer Science

projects.project-1: Greek and Hebrew study tools, concordances, commentaries, dictionaries. Stack: Angular, Node + Express, MongoDB
